title: Garden Super Hero Tales
description: "Garden Super Hero Tales" is the first volume in a series of 10 that will set the stage for 100 different veggies, herbs and fruit, to show their true super powers for a healthy diet. The books are inspired by the author's own son, Paul-Jules, who is the main hero of the stories. The reader joins the little boy as he explores the magical world of the veggies, who traveled around the world, and have many beautiful memories to share. Smaller children can still follow Paul-Jules's journey, through images by photographer Mihai Petre, and beautiful illustrations by Patricia Revita.
author: Mihaela Lica Butler
